abstract: European regulators signaled that Microsoft’s offer to sell a browser-less Windows system on the Continent did not go far enough to enable competition.
snippet: European regulators signaled that Microsoft’s offer to sell a browser-less Windows system on the Continent did not go far enough to enable competition.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN  European regulators, wary of repeating an earlier mistake, signaled this week that Microsoft’s offer to sell a browserless Windows system on the Continent did not go far enough.

headline.main: Microsoft Browser Offer Fails to Impress Europe
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Browser Offer Fails to Impress Europe
